name: @vlsergey/batcher
description: Small JavaScript module to batch async requests with queue

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc -p ./src/tsconfig-cjs.json && cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc -p ./src/tsconfig-esm.json
scripts.test:watch:chrome: cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env BROWSERSLIST="last 2 Chrome versions" karma start karma.conf.js --no-single-run --browsers Chrome
scripts.preversion: npm run build && npm run eslint:fix && npm test && npm run clean && npm run build

author: Sergey Vladimirov <vlsergey@gmail.com>
